amendment.description: Relating to the basic allowance for housing for members of the reserves.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1424 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 1424 proposed by Senator Warner for Senator Leahy. (consideration: CR S12497-12513; text: CR S12500) Relating to the basic allowance for housing for members of the reserves.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 1424 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1424 proposed by Senator Warner for Senator Leahy.
